page.title: 19RECREATION ARTS & CRAFTS
page.content: The most popular hobby is gardening then reading and fell-walking, but many people have craft hobbies. In art/craft hobbies the most popular is knitting followed by (in order) dressmaking, photography, royal icing, sewing, flower arranging,oil painting pottery, modelling, philately, embroid -ery, tapestry and tatting. The most popular sports are (in order) swimming, bowls, golf, riding, darts, table-tennis, tennis, pool, squash, hunting, shooting, netball and football. Some of these facilities are not available in Skelton. Other hobbies in order are gardening, reading,fell-walking,walking,music, drawing,DIY,bird-watching,meteorology, watching TV,keeping tropical fish and completing crossword puzzles.
